claim_card.claim: The results support a conservative interpretation in which morphology-sensitive observables form a complementary 'pre-metric' descriptive layer that extends, but does not replace, standard metric analysis.
claim_card.test_hook: Test whether the same morphology-sensitive advantage persists across broader null families, alternative reconstructions, and independent replications; failure to reproduce would weaken the interpretation.

source.locator: p2 (definition of pre-metric framing); p8â€“10 (Discussion and Conclusion)
source.note: Interpretive claim explicitly separated from raw empirical discrimination result
